ygData.subject: Re: Very New Player
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, from your name I would say you re a wood elf, female.  So you re wandering around Kelethin, the city of great heights.  So be careful! This place is a
ygData.messageBody:
Well, from your name I would say you're a wood elf, female. So
you're wandering around Kelethin, the city of great heights. So be
careful!

This place is a good start. Some of the other favorites are
Castersrealm, Allakhazam's Magic Realm, Everlore and EQ Traders
Corner.

Other important questions are what class are you, like Druid, Ranger
or Warrior. We got plenty of them all!

Tul

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Tracy" <MistressBeautyful@h...>
wrote:
> Hello,
>
> My husband just bought me the EverQuest Evolution today and I have
> installed it and it looks wonderful but I am having a devil of a
> time trying to figure any of it out. Are there any sites on the
web
> that can help me learn the aspects of this game? I just keep
> walking around in circles looking at people.
>
> Tracy~Liladadere
